#Example: Large parts of Africa and south east Asia
tropical = { 
	# Southwest Africa
	1164 1165 1166 1167 1169 1170 1171 1172 1901 2948

#Example: Most of Europe north of med.
mild_winter = { 
	# Scandinavia
	6 12 13 14 15 26 1981 1982 1983 1984
	4141 4142 4149 4165 44 54 55 1775 1931 1874
	87 88 89 90 91 92 93 94 95 96
	97 98 99 100 1742 1743 1744 1866 1865 1878
	2973 2974 2975 4381 4382 4383 4769 4770 167 168

	4390 4391 4392 4694 4697 206 207 209 1745 4554

#Example: Inland Europe & Scandinavia
normal_winter = { 
	# Scandinavia
	1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 16 17
	22 23 24 25 27 28 29 34 35 36
	37 38 39 1930 1985 4123 4143 4144 4145 4163
	4164 4166 40 41 42 43 45 46 47 48
	767 770 771 2993 2994 2995 2996 49 50 51
	52 53 56 57 58 59 60 61 62 63
	64 65 66 67 68 69 70 71 72 74
	75 77 78 79 80 81 82 83 84 85
	86 1757 1758 1759 1760 1761 1762 1763 1858 1857
	1859 1876 1880 2955 2956 2957 2958 2959 2960 2961
	2962 2963 2964 2965 2966 2967 2968 2970 2969 2971
	2972 2991 4707 4708 4709 4711 4712 4713 4714 4715
	4716 4717 4718 1872 1868 4741 4742 4743 4744 4745
	4746 4747 4748 4749 4771 4772 4773 4774 4775 4786
	133 134 135 153 154 155 156 157 158 160
	161 162 1756 1767 1770 1772 1863 1864 2998 1318
	4125 4126 4127 4128 4173 4155 4236 4240 4760 4761
	4762 246 247 248 249 250 251 252 253 254
	255 256 257 258 259 260 261 262 263 264
	265 266 267 269 270 271 272 273 274 275
	276 277 278 279 280 281 283 288 289 290
	2424 291 292 1771 2407 2997 4115 4237 4238 4241
	4242 4244 4246 4247 4361 4362 4363 4364 4365 4523

equator_y_on_province_image = 656
